name: County Ready to Respond to Wildfires, Are You?
description: Drought, high temperature and other factors are combining to create historic wildfire conditions, and County officials want to make sure the region and public are prepared.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Drought, high temperature and other factors are combining to create historic wildfire conditions, and County officials want to make sure the region and public are prepared. CAL FIRE/San Diego County Fire Protection District, along with mutual aid support provided by partners from across the region, are prepared and ready to respond with comprehensive resources, and help residents increase safety and the survivability of their home. Download the SD Emergency app to get preparedness information and updates during an emergency, and take important steps to prevent wildfires and prepare for emergencies.
